author: _shemnon
content: As mentioned on the call, here's the test that shold cover all of the opcodes that would be impacted by address space expansion - https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/f91d64ad2493acb2d2322c7a9f7853af7b8847a8/src/GeneralStateTestsFiller/stBadOpcode/invalidAddrFiller.yml

author: chfast
content: We mostly touch or remove most of them in EOF. Exception seems to be `BALANCE`.

author: chfast
content: Although these do not include instructions returning addresses, but these are less problematic.

author: chfast
content: We could handle extended address as if the account does not exist (seems better to revert because reverting would need to be changed if ASE is actually implemented). But they are funny quirks, e.g. you burn ETH with this.
